snippet: The Amphion String Quartet focused on the early 20th century in a program on Sunday at Alice Tully Hall.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performance by Amphion String Quartet at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Amphion String Quartet focused on the early 20th century in a program on Sunday at Alice Tully Hall.
